Description: Define the project vision and objectives
Create and prioritize the product backlog
Determine what can be delivered in the sprint and how that work will be achieved
15-minute time-boxed meeting for the Development Team to synchronize activities and create a plan for the next 24 hours
Inspect the increment and adapt the Product Backlog if needed
Inspect the past Sprint with regards to people
column6: and tools and plan for improvements

Description: Establish criteria that must be met for the work to be considered complete
Automate the integration of code changes from multiple contributors
Ensure that the software can be reliably released at any time
Plan for the release of the product increment
Deploy the product increment to production
Evaluate the success of the release and gather feedback
Regularly review and update the product backlog to ensure it is up-to-date and prioritized
Regularly communicate with stakeholders to keep them informed about the project's progress
